name: Rocco's Inferno
detailed_description:
Rocco Dante has been on the fast track up the ranks of the Reggiani crime Family ever since he made his bones. Nice house, beautiful wife, stripes on his shoulder, all the free pizza he can eat – Rocco's got it made. But things at the top of the Family are changing, and after the rise, usually comes the fall. Will Rocco's past finally catch up with him? Is there any path left that doesn't lead to the Infernal fires of Hell? Or has he been trapped in the Inferno this whole time already?

Rocco's Inferno is a top down, narrative role playing game which pays homage to the two greatest works of Italian literature - The Divine Comedy... and The Sopranos... You play as Rocco Dante, a captain in the Reggiani crime Family. Between gangland territory disputes, an unfolding city-wide power struggle, the reappearance of an old flame and more, a normal day in the life of a mobster turns into a living nightmare. As for who will still be living by tomorrow, that is up to you.

Experience dialogue based gameplay which maintains an authentic conversational flow. Play again and again to uncover new one liners, backstory and references every time.

short_description: Rocco's Inferno is a top down, narrative role playing game which pays homage to the two greatest works of Italian literature - The Divine Comedy... and The Sopranos. You play through a day in the life of Rocco Dante, a captain in the Reggiani crime Family. How will your Family look tomorrow?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 Display

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: Contains depictions of sex, violence (including domestic abuse), prejudicial attitudes and drug abuse.
